title: UCUpdateAlert
description: JSON Schema for Log Analytics table: UCUpdateAlert

AlertClassification.description: Whether this Alert is an Error, a Warning, or Informational.

AlertData.description: An optional string formatted as a json payload containing metadata for the alert.

AlertId.description: The unique identifier of this Alert.

AlertRank.description: Integer ranking of Alert for prioritization during troubleshooting.

AlertStatus.description: Whether this Alert is Active, Resolved, or Deleted.

AlertType.description: The type of Alert this is, ClientUpdateAlert, ServiceUpdateAlert. Indicates which fields will be present.

AzureADDeviceId.description: A GUID corresponding to the AAD Tenant to which the device belongs.

AzureADTenantId.description: A GUID corresponding to this device's AAD Device ID.

ClientSubstate.description: If the Alert is from the Client, the ClientSubstate at the time thie Alert was activated or updated, else Empty.

DeploymentId.description: The identifier of the Deployment that is targeting this update to this device, else empty.

Description.description: A localized string translated from a combination of other Alert fields + language preference that describes the issue in detail.

ErrorCode.description: The Error Code, if any, that triggered this Alert. In the case of Client-based explicit alerts, error codes can have extended error codes, which are appended to the error code with a underscore separator.

ErrorSymName.description: The symbolic name that maps to the Error Code, if any. Otherwise empty.

Recommendation.description: A localized string translated from RecommendedAction, Message, and other fields (depending on source of Alert) that provides a recommended action.

ResolvedTime.description: The time this alert was resolved, else empty.

SCCMClientId.description: A GUID corresponding to the SCCM Client ID on the device.

ServiceSubstate.description: Ranking of Client Substates for sequential ordering in funnel-type views. The rankings between ServiceSubstate and ClientSubstate can be used together.

SourceSystem.description: The type of agent the event was collected by. For example, OpsManager for Windows agent, either direct connect or Operations Manager, Linux for all Linux agents, or Azure for Azure Diagnostics

StartTime.description: The time this alert was activated.

TargetBuild.description: The full build of the content this DeviceUpdateEvent is tracking. For Windows 10 updates, this would correspond to the full build (10.0.14393.385).

TimeGenerated.description: Time at which this event is generated.

UpdateCategory.description: The type of content this DeviceUpdateEvent is tracking.

UpdateClassification.description: Whether this content is an Upgrade (FU), Security (QU), NonSecurity (QU)

UpdateId.description: Update ID of the targeted update.

URL.description: An optional URL to get more in-depth information related to this alert.
